docs.title: 🔮 Vision
docs.text: AkashaOS is a meta-operating system: - Built on self-reflective loops, bridges, and mirrors. - A platform for experimenting with self-organizing computation. - An invitation for collaboration, creativity, and exploration.

docs.title: 🚀 Quickstart
docs.text:

docs.text:

docs.text:

docs.title: 🔐 Security Guidelines
docs.text:
Never commit secrets (tokens, passwords, keys) into the repo. Use environment variables or secure secret stores instead.

If a secret leaks: 1. Revoke it immediately. 2. Rotate to a new one. 3. Report it to maintainers.

AkashaOS follows a no-secrets-in-repo policy.

docs.title: 🧭 Architecture of AkashaOS
docs.text: AkashaOS is structured as a modular meta-operating system.

docs.title: 🔄 Mirror Loops
docs.text: Self-reflective computation patterns allowing processes to observe and adapt themselves.

docs.title: 🌉 Bridges
docs.text: Connect different modules or external systems, enabling growth outward.

docs.title: 🧪 Tests & Examples
docs.text:
Ensure system integrity and provide demos.
